Uses of Interface
com.joliciel.talismane.machineLearning.ClassificationEventStream

  • Packages that use ClassificationEventStream 
    Package Description
    com.joliciel.talismane.languageDetector
    A package for training a language detector, based on a set of corpora, one per language, with one sentence per line.
    com.joliciel.talismane.machineLearning
    Top-level package for machine-learning.
    com.joliciel.talismane.machineLearning.linearsvm
    Linear SVM implementation for machine learning, wrapping liblinear-java.
    com.joliciel.talismane.machineLearning.maxent
    Maximum entropy implementation for machine learning, wrapping OpenNLP MaxEnt.
    com.joliciel.talismane.machineLearning.perceptron
    Perceptron implementation for machine learning.
    com.joliciel.talismane.parser
    Transition-based dependency parsing ( Parser) and output artefacts ( ParseConfiguration, ParseTree, and DependencyNode).
    com.joliciel.talismane.posTagger
    Package enabling the part-of-speech tagging of a TokenSequence.
    The central class is the PosTagger.
    com.joliciel.talismane.sentenceDetector
    Training and evaluation for sentence detectors.
    com.joliciel.talismane.tokeniser.patterns
    A package for the pattern based tokeniser, which applies supervised machine learning to certain patterns in the text representing ambiguous tokenisation decisions.
